ygData.messageBody:
pickpocket comes from the primary loot pool?

heh, try convincing the world of this. everyone has a different conclusion.
it's too bad verant refuses to give diffinitive answers to questions like
these.

-kg


>From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu <countess_bathory_69@...>
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>Subject: [shadowknight] More fun with Decaying
>Date: Tue, 19 Oct 1999 11:57:09 -0700 (PDT)
>
>
>Through a 6 hour period we killed about 8 Crusaders.
>Not bad. We've spent much more time there and have
>killed less. But how many pieces of decaying do you
>think were dropped? one. 6 hours, 8 Crusaders one
>drop.
>
>But thats not even the best part. Now sit back and
>listen to my tale.
>
>We are on our 3rd or 4th Crusader. KIll him. Loot.
>Nothing again. Damnit.
>Our rogue says "I got it!"
>"ummm..you got what?"
>rogue, "a BP!"
>"WHAT!?!?!"
>rogue, "a decaying BP"
>
>much swearing and cursing ensues.
>
>"its NO DROP"
>rogue,"oh, damnit"
>"why do you think we were the only ones looting them?"
>rogue,"i didnt loot it. I pickpocketed it"
>"WHAT!?!?!" "i thought rogues pickpocket from a
>different pool than the loot one"
>rogue, "different pool for cash, but not items. But
>those items are supposed to be inaccessible"
>
>So now we have a rogue who pickpocketed our SK only NO
>DROP item.
>
>My friend petitions. Rogue petitions.
>Both end up talking to a guide since no real GM is on.
>She "can't" do anything about it.
>The rogue puts up a good fight though.She does feel
>real bad about it. She goes thru how bad this
>knowledge would be if it got spread to the public.
>
>Think about it. How many people would want rogues
>around at all if they thought they might pickpocket
>the quest items that they need?
>
>The guide started to see the resoning. However still
>no BP for us. Even the suggestion of creating a
>dynamic character and letting one of us loot the BP
>from him wasnt accepted.
>
>And thats how we left it.
>
>3 or 4 Crusaders later with no decaying and both of us
>SKs were just too ticked to keep playing.
>
>
>The moral of the story..ummm..there isnt one i dont
>think..but do yourself a favor and make sure you tell
>any rigue you are grouped with to NOT pickpocket the
>Crusaders or you will be added a sequel to my little
>adventure.
>
>Now let me say this. The BP isnt all that great and i
>wouldnt wear it anyway. But i would still like to do
>the quest if i happen to end up with the items.
>But more importantly, this could have just as easily
>been an item i needed.
>
>And i did a nice little FEEDBACK right before i logged
>letting "them" know how lame and pathetic this
>so-called "quest" is.
>And i dont consider this a quest. Sitting in CT
>waiting for the same MOB over and over is camping, not
>questing.
>There was obviously no thought process put into this
>at all.
>And has anyone found a weapon quest for SKs yet?
>Throughout the different sites i have noticed that
>quite a few classes have had weapon quests put in with
>the last patch. Just wondering if we got the same
>consideration *snicker*
>
>
>Anyway thats my rant for today.
>
>Enjoy kiddies
>
